<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...That's right. To become the Hero and trade places
with you, I was born from this Creation Vortex.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50977.<voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...By the hand of the Great Demon King, Madesagora.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50978.<voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Great Demon King Madesagora...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50979.<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>But I wasn't able to awaken as the Hero. I was looked
down upon as an utter failure, and Great Demon King
washed his hands of me...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50980.<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>And yet, I couldn't just give up... For me, excluding
becoming the Hero, I had nothing else to live for,
so...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50981.<voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...To awaken, I did everything. Everything I could.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50982.<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>However, no matter the method, the time of awakening
never came... That's when you appeared...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50983.<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>My body trembled, I was so overjoyed. If I took the
True Hero's powers, then, finally, I would become
the Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50984.<voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>And this is what I have to show for it...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50985.<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Let me tell you something... I am not the only one
the Great Demon King has created.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50986.<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>All who live in this land... Everything that exists
here was created by the Great Demon King with the
Creation Vortex's magical power.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50987.<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>This is False Lendersia! This land itself is a
fabrication, a cursed world that cannot be saved!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50989.<voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>She, too, was suffering from her own fate...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50990.<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Be that as it may, if everything in this world is a
fabrication... Then what in the world is the Great
Demon King planning?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50991.<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>In addition... If this really is False Lendersia,
then the True Lendersia is...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50992.<voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>It seems you have learned the secret of this world.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50993.<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I have been waiting for this moment. When the True
Hero awakens to destroy the False Hero, this exact
moment.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50994.<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>What has become of the Lendersia you once knew...
The means to learn it exists here.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50995.<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This is the Brave Stone. A secret stone that, if it
were used by the Hero, one could even cross the
dimensional barrier to any place one desired.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50996.<voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If I use this we can return to True Lendersia!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50997.<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This is the way. The False Hero, after she awakened,
intended to use this stone to cross over into True
Lendersia, it seems.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50998.<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>However, during the battle, the stone was damaged.
If you give me a moment, I can fix it. How about it?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000610.<voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Please! Please see to it that this stone is usable!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000611.<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Then, please wait for me in Gran Zedora Castle's
western tower, in the princess' room on the third
floor.
<auto_br=3500>
As soon as the stone is repaired, I shall deliver it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000612.<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, did you hear that. Let's briefly

29000613.<voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>And then... Together to True Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000614.<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c0:

29000615.<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Still, I haven't had any contact from Crows yet,

29000616.<voice 01755_29000616><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01755_29000616><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>My apologies for keeping you waiting.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53842.<voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Crows! What has become of the Bravestone!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51008.<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Rest assured. It's been flawlessly repaired. Here,

51009.<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Thank you so much! With this, we can return to

53843.<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now then, Princess Anlucia. I want you to call to

53844.<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>If you can do that, the Brave Stone will surely

53845.<voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I understand. I'll give it a try!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53846.<voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Take us to the true Lendersia!!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75305.<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>You have come, opponents of Lady Anlucia. If you

75319.<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m0:
